Helping make your musical dreams come true!

WHAT IS MIXING?

In a few words, mixing is where we will balance, blend, clean, and curate your stems to sound like a more cohesive piece of music. Our trained engineers work delicately to make sure that the mix you receive is what you envisioned with your song when you started it or first heard it in your head.

WHAT IS MASTERING?

This is the final stage of the process. The mix sounds good, and now we do the final tweaks, making it sound loud, full, and translate to all types of speakers, from a phone all the way up to a large venue sound system.

Hear some examples of what a mix and master can do for your tracks
